justification: “Following the response, participants were asked to report their confidence in making the correct choice on a 4-point scale.”

measured_by: percentage of correct responses / proportion correct
justification: “There was no significant difference in mean choice accuracy across participants between the more frame (71.0%) and the less frame (72.6%).”

measured_by: bidding task on a food lineup
justification: “Prior to their main experiment, participants underwent a bidding task on a food lineup, from which the subjective value of each food stimulus was calculated for each participant.”
